backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with all domain types for orgs, users, CRM entities, documents, projects, deals, activities, contracts, NPS, reports, finance, support, and churn.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing the change to update the Pipeline page header title and the files/components involved.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for many frontend files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file setting up fonts, metadata, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring QueryClient, router, theming, auth, org context, and toast behavior.
frontend/src/app/layout/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper that conditionally displays topbar, sidebar, and bottom navigation based on authentication and route.
frontend/src/app/layout/BottomNav.tsx: Mobile bottom navigation bar with links to main sections and a button to open the mobile menu.
frontend/src/app/layout/MobileNavMenu.ts: Slide‑in mobile navigation menu showing internal and portal sections based on user permissions.
frontend/src/app/layout/Sidebar.tsx: Desktop sidebar rendering internal and portal navigation sections with active highlighting based on current route.
frontend/src/app/layout/Topbar.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with logo, current organization, and user dropdown including org switching and logout.
Redirects authenticated users to the correct page based on role and organization status, showing a loading state meanwhile.
frontend/src/app/router/ProtectedRoute.t: Guards routes by checking authentication and optionally organization selection, showing loading or access-denied states.
frontend/src/app/router/routes.tsx: Defines all application routes, wrapping protected pages with layout and access control components.
frontend/src/app/router/routeTree.tsx: Empty placeholder file for router tree setup.
frontend/src/auth/AuthProvider.tsx: Provides authentication via Internet Identity, loading user profiles from backend and exposing login/logout state.
frontend/src/auth/InternetIdentityAuthAd: Maps Internet Identity and backend profile data into the app’s unified auth user format, including role resolution.
frontend/src/auth/MockAuthProvider.tsx: Empty placeholder for a mock authentication provider.
frontend/src/auth/roles.ts: Defines application roles, metadata, and helper functions for permission checks.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Displays the brand logo image with text fallback on load error.
frontend/src/components/states/AccessDen: UI screen showing access denied message with a button to return to the home page.
frontend/src/components/states/BackendCl: Handles backend initialization states, showing loading, error with retry, or rendering children when ready.
frontend/src/components/states/QueryBoun: Wraps query-based components to show standardized loading, error, empty, or content states.
Provides React UI components for loading, error, and empty states with optional messages and actions.
frontend/src/config/dataMode.ts: Defines data mode utilities that always return BACKEND and disable mock mode.
frontend/src/data/api/backendClient.ts: Implements mappings between frontend and backend data types and roles for API communication.
frontend/src/data/client.ts: Defines the unified DataClient interface and types for backend operations across projects, CRM, and documents.
frontend/src/data/mock/mockClient.ts: Empty placeholder for mock data client.
frontend/src/data/mock/seed.ts: Empty placeholder for mock seed data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and logic for login, logout, and identity management.
frontend/src/hooks/useKanbanBoard.ts: Hook for fetching a specific Kanban board and managing custom field definition updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useKanbanBoards.ts: Hook for listing, creating, and renaming Kanban boards within an organization.
frontend/src/hooks/useKanbanCards.ts: Provides React Query hooks to list, create, update, move, and delete Kanban cards with optimistic updates and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/usePipelineStages.ts: Manages pipeline stage operations including listing, creating, renaming, deleting, and reordering stages using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useStage1Client.ts: Initializes and exposes the backend client based on the authenticated actor, returning readiness state and error handling.
frontend/src/i18n/strings.ptBR.ts: Centralized pt-BR UI strings for common actions, errors, success messages, navigation, and pipeline labels.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styling plus custom theme variables, dark mode settings, utilities, and Sonner toast adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query and identity provider before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/org/OrgProvider.tsx: Context provider managing current organization selection, loading from profile, and role‑based org selection requirements.
frontend/src/pages/auth/CreateOrganizati: Form page to create a new organization, update selection, refresh queries, and navigate after creation.
frontend/src/pages/auth/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity, redirecting authenticated users and showing a branded UI.
frontend/src/pages/auth/SelectOrganizati: Allows users to pick or create an organization, fetching orgs via React Query and navigating after selection.
frontend/src/pages/auth/SignupPage.tsx: Implements a signup form with validation, mock submission, and redirect to login.
frontend/src/pages/internal/ActivitiesPa: Lists and creates activities tied to an organization, supporting filters, dialogs, and related entities.
frontend/src/pages/internal/ContactsPage: Provides CRUD operations for contacts with search, dialogs, and React Query integration.
frontend/src/pages/internal/ContractsPag: Displays recurring contracts with filters, metrics, and a dialog for creating new contracts.
frontend/src/pages/internal/customer-suc: Provides a dialog for submitting NPS responses, validating input, and handling disabled state when no active campaign exists.
frontend/src/pages/internal/CustomerSucc: Manages customer success metrics including contracts, NPS campaigns, and responses with period filtering.
frontend/src/pages/internal/DashboardPag: Fetches contacts, deals, contracts, and activities to compute metrics like MRR, pipeline value, and upcoming tasks, rendering a dashboard of business stats.
frontend/src/pages/internal/DealDetailPa: Loads a specific deal and its contact, showing status, stage, values, and metadata with navigation back to the pipeline.
Manages finance transactions with creation, filtering, sorting, and summary metrics like income, expenses, and balance.
frontend/src/pages/internal/pipeline/Add: Dialog for creating a new kanban card, including title, description, and custom field handling with board-level definitions.
frontend/src/pages/internal/pipeline/Car: Dialog for editing or deleting an existing kanban card with support for due dates and custom fields synced to board definitions.
frontend/src/pages/internal/pipeline/Cus: Editor component for adding, removing, and updating custom fields and their options, notifying parent components of definition updates.
frontend/src/pages/internal/pipeline/Kan: Displays a draggable kanban card with preview info and opens the edit dialog for updates or deletion.
frontend/src/pages/internal/pipeline/Pip: Renders a kanban pipeline column with rename, delete, move, drag-and-drop, and card management dialogs. Handles card updates, creation, deletion, and movement between stages.
frontend/src/pages/internal/PipelinePage: Handles kanban boards and stages with creation, selection, reordering, and card management for pipeline workflow.
Displays available reports, export history, and allows users to generate new reports with chosen period and format.
frontend/src/pages/internal/settings/Tea: Displays team members and pending invitations with React Query and provides a dialog to invite new members. Currently warns that backend support for member management is incomplete.
frontend/src/pages/internal/SettingsPage: Renders the internal settings page with tabs for organization info, preferences, and team management.
frontend/src/pages/portal/DeliverablesPa: Fetches and displays project deliverables grouped by status using tabs. Shows loading, error, and empty states and supports projects selected in the portal.
Lists organization documents and provides a dialog to upload new ones with category mapping and upload progress. Uses React Query for fetching and uploading documents.
frontend/src/pages/portal/KpisPage.tsx: Fetches and displays project KPIs with trend icons and labels. Handles loading, error, empty states, and requires an active project.
frontend/src/pages/portal/MeetingsPage.t: Displays upcoming and past meetings for the active project and provides a dialog to create new meetings using React Query.
frontend/src/pages/portal/MessagesPage.t: Shows an organization’s support message thread and allows sending new messages with role-based badges.
frontend/src/pages/portal/PortalSettings: Implements portal settings UI with toggles for notifications, display options, and privacy, simulating save behavior.
frontend/src/pages/portal/ProjectDashboa: Fetches and displays projects, lets the user select an active one, and shows key project details and stage info.
frontend/src/pages/portal/StageTimelineP: Loads a project and renders a timeline of its stages along with basic project information.
frontend/src/pages/portal/TasksPage.tsx: React page that lists project tasks, allows creating new tasks, and updates their status using React Query mutations.
frontend/src/portal/useActiveProject.ts: Hook that manages the active project ID with sessionStorage persistence and reset support.
frontend/src/toast/configureSonner.ts: Configures global Sonner toast behavior by overriding toast.success to use a 1‑second default duration.
frontend/src/types/kanbanCards.ts: Type definitions for Kanban cards, including custom fields and inputs for create/update operations.
frontend/src/types/model.ts: Central domain model types covering orgs, users, CRM entities, tasks, activities, contracts, and more.
frontend/src/types/pipelineStages.ts: Type definitions for pipeline stages (Kanban columns) and their reordering updates.
frontend/src/utils/kanbanCustomFields.ts: Utility functions that map, normalize, and convert custom field definitions between backend and frontend formats.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support and hash routing handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, including schema/version info, an existing feature updating a page header title, and a pending request to rename the Pipeline page header. Contains metadata such as issues, architectural notes, and project configuration.
